abstract: The U.S. Federal Communications Commission on Tuesday approved Verizon Wireless’s $2.35 billion wireless spectrum license sale to AT&T, Reuters reported.
snippet: The U.S. Federal Communications Commission on Tuesday approved Verizon Wireless’s $2.35 billion wireless spectrum license sale to AT&T, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: The U.S. Federal Communications Commission on Tuesday approved Verizon Wireless‘s $2.35 billion wireless spectrum license sale to AT&T, Reuters reported.

headline.main: F.C.C. Clears Sale of Verizon Assets to AT&T
